solution_line_template: For the tuna Barbara needed to pay {tuna_packs} * {cost_per_tuna_pack} = $<<{tuna_packs}*{cost_per_tuna_pack}={cost_tuna}>>{cost_tuna}.
For the four bottles of water, she needed to pay {water_bottles} * {cost_per_water_bottle} = $<<{water_bottles}*{cost_per_water_bottle}={cost_water}>>{cost_water}.
